title: Flatwoods monster
summary: The Flatwoods monster (also known as the Braxton County monster, phantom of Flatwoods, or "Braxxy"), in West Virginia folklore, is an entity reported to have been sighted in the town of Flatwoods in Braxton County, West Virginia, United States, on SeptemberÂ 12, 1952, after a bright object crossed the night sky. Over 50 years later, investigators concluded that the light was a meteor and the creature was a barn owl perched in a tree, with shadows making it appear to be a large humanoid.[1]
